physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features  group of musicians. All of them are adults except for two children. The adults in the front row are sitting down while the people in the back row stand. All of the adults are holding a musical instrument, such as a violins, banjos, and guitars etc. There is a drum present at the centre as well. The background features a single storey roofed building and several tall trees. ""Sunbeam Musical Party
title_text: Photograph of Sunbeam Musical Party Sunbeam Musical Party
